IAVG(6D)                                               IAVG(6D)





NAME
       iavg - average a set of images

SYNOPSIS
       iavg outimage imgfiles . . .

DESCRIPTION
       iavg averages a set of images. All the input images must
       be the same xsize and ysize in pixels.



IRIX 6.5                  May 5, 2004                  IAVG(6D)
